name: RIDE.SHARE
description:
A mobile AR game where you become a supreme AI overload managing a fleet of self-driving rideshare cars to beat out rival companies.

Please fill out our sign-up form to provide additional feedback or receive future email updates about our game: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdZ47yi7wSKPDAgo_d8wmbWa73XdqETcjmgnxRf...

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RideShareAR

Follow us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/RideShare-2519271811422788/?modal=admin_todo_tour&ref=a...
